dsOverview.title: Global Ocean Precipitation Frequency and Characteristics, by Petty

summary.p: Grant Petty used the present-weather code values from COADS shipboard reports (1958-1991) to evaluate the frequencies and characteristics of global oceanic precipitation.

creator.name: UCAR/NCAR/CISL/DSS > Data Support Section, Computational and Information Systems Laboratory, National Center for Atmospheric Research, University Corporation for Atmospheric Research

contributor.name: PURDUE/EAS > Department of Earth & Atmospheric Sciences, Purdue University

reference.title: Frequencies and Characteristics of Global Oceanic Precipitation from Shipboard Present-Weather Reports
